name: Swarm Defense (Prototype)
description:
Welcome to the prototype of the mobile version of Swarm Defense: Planetary Invasion.

Swarm Defense does not represent the final concept of our project. It is just a scrap of mechanics without finished graphics and sounds.

Do not consider this piece of code as a playable game. The prototype is an unstable fragment of the original idea, you may encounter bugs and problems with the mechanics, our goal was mainly to test and have pure fun while creating, we would appreciate it if you give us your feedback.

Custom Engine FROSTengine (JS, HTML5)

Mobile Gameplay

PC Gameplay
